verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G5656><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the seals <S%G4973><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, as it were <S%G5613><s%> the noise <S%G5456><s%> of thunder <S%G1027><s%>, one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G991><s%> <S%G5720><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G991><s%> <S%G5720><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there went out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> another <S%G243><s%> horse <S%G2462><s%> that was red <S%G4450><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> power was given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> thereon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G846><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5629><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should kill <S%G4969><s%> <S%G5661><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, A measure <S%G5518><s%> of wheat <S%G4621><s%> for a penny <S%G1220><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> measures <S%G5518><s%> of barley <S%G2915><s%> for a penny <S%G1220><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> see thou hurt <S%G91><s%> <S%G5661><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the oil <S%G1637><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the fourth <S%G5067><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G991><s%> <S%G5720><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I looked <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%> a pale <S%G5515><s%> horse <S%G2462><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> that sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1883><s%> him <S%G846><s%> was Death <S%G2288><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> SH'ol <S%G86><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5719><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the fourth part <S%G5067><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, to kill <S%G615><s%> <S%G5658><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> hunger <S%G3042><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> the beasts <S%G2342><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the fifth <S%G3991><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> the souls <S%G5590><s%> of them that were slain <S%G4969><s%> <S%G5772><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they held <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5707><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> they cried <S%G2896><s%> <S%G5707><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, How <S%G2193><s%> long <S%G4219><s%>, O YY <S%G1203><s%>, holy <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> true <S%G228><s%>, dost thou <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> avenge <S%G1556><s%> <S%G5719><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> on <S%G575><s%> them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5723><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> robes <S%G4749><s%> were given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto every one of them <S%G1538><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it was said <S%G4483><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they should rest <S%G373><s%> <S%G5672><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> for a little <S%G3398><s%> season <S%G5550><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> their <S%G846><s%> fellowservants <S%G4889><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, that should <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%> be killed <S%G615><s%> <S%G5745><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> were, should <S%G3739><s%> be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5695><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I beheld <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> seal <S%G4973><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, lo <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, there was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake <S%G4578><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> black <S%G3189><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> of hair <S%G5155><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the moon <S%G4582><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> the stars <S%G792><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, even as <S%G5613><s%> a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> casteth <S%G906><s%> <S%G5719><s%> her <S%G846><s%> untimely figs <S%G3653><s%>, when she is shaken <S%G4579><s%> <S%G5746><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> a mighty <S%G3173><s%> wind <S%G417><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> departed <S%G673><s%> <S%G5681><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a scroll <S%G975><s%> when it is rolled together <S%G1507><s%> <S%G5746><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> island <S%G3520><s%> were moved <S%G2795><s%> <S%G5681><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> places <S%G5117><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the great men <S%G3175><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the rich men <S%G4145><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the chief captains <S%G5506><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the mighty men <S%G1415><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> bondman <S%G1401><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> free man <S%G1658><s%>, hid <S%G2928><s%> <S%G5656><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the dens <S%G4693><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the rocks <S%G4073><s%> of the mountains <S%G3735><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to the mountains <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rocks <S%G4073><s%>, Fall <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5628><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hide <S%G2928><s%> <S%G5657><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of him that sitteth <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%>:

For <S%G3754><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> shall be able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5683><s%>?
